description:
Bastian clearly spends a lot of time training in the gym. The dude has got some major guns on him!
At the time of filming this, the holidays were fast approaching, and Bastian thought doing a solo would be a good way to get some extra cash flowing.
He is a very sexual guy, jacking off 2-3 times a day, and he definitely has the showmanship of someone who is proud to show off his body. He plays to the camera quite nicely.
And for someone who jacks off a lot, he sure blows a major load!
title: Bastian - Solo
